commitResults.messageBody:
Remove Duke.java

Add Sigmund.java

.gitignore: Add *.class to ignore Java class files

commitResults.messageTitle: feat: echos commands entered by the user, and exits when the user types the command bye
feat: Add the ability to store whatever text entered by the user and display them back to the user when requested
feat: Add the ability to mark tasks as done. Optionally, add the ability to change the status back to not done.
commitResults.messageBody: refactor: use a Task class to represent tasks.

commitResults.messageTitle: feat: implement classes Todo, Deadline and Event classes inherits from a Task class
commitResults.messageBody: All three overrides getType function. Implement Event and Deadline getDeadlineTime/getEventTime

commitResults.messageTitle: feat: add ToDo, Deadline, and Event task types
commitResults.messageBody:
- Implement ToDos (tasks without dates), Deadlines (with 'by' date),
  and Events (with 'from/to' dates).
- Fix bug where all input stream data was being converted to lowercase,
  preserving original user casing.
- Refactor UI to reduce the frequency of breakline separators.
- Implement ANSI colored text printing for improved CLI feedback.

fix: preserve case sensitivity in user input

style: reduce breakline usage and add colored text support

commitResults.messageTitle: test: remove ANSI color code from output stream using ./runtest.sh and sed

commitResults.messageBody: make Todo a child class of Task. make Deadline and Event inherit from Todo. use override toString() instead of getType() and more

commitResults.messageTitle: feat: implement centralized error handling and help command
commitResults.messageBody:
- Create SigmundException class for unified "OOPS!!!" error reporting
- Add centralized try-catch block in main loop to handle logic errors
- Implement help command to display command formats and usage
- Refactor project structure to use 'sigmund' package for better management
- Add validation to prevent empty descriptions and invalid task numbers
